data.content:
Tính từ
(nói về nữ là blonde)
[có] tóc hoe
Danh từ
(nữ là blonde)
người có tóc hoe
who was that blonde I saw with you last night?
chị tóc hoe tối hôm qua tôi thấy đi với anh là ai thế?

adjective
or blonde blonder; -est
of a yellow or very light brown color
long blond hair
blonde curls/locks/braids
She has blonde highlights in her hair.
His hair was dyed/bleached blond. also; :having blond hair
a blond actor
She was blonde as a child.
When used to describe a boy or man, the word is spelled blond. When used for a girl or woman, the word is often spelled blonde.
A person with dirty blond hair has very dark blond hair that is almost light brown in color. - see also platinum blonde, strawberry blonde
of a very light color
a table made of blond wood
noun
or blonde , pl blondes
[count] :a person who has yellow or very light brown hair
The word is spelled blond when used for a boy or man, and it is usually spelled blonde when used for a girl or woman.
He's a tall, blue-eyed blond.
She's a natural blonde. [=her hair has not been dyed blonde]
a bottle/bleached/peroxide blonde [=someone whose hair has been made blond through the use of chemicals] - see also platinum blonde, strawberry blonde
